creditline: Gift of Dr. Gabriel P. and Yvonne M.L. Weisberg in honor of Elizabeth K. Mix (Menon)
description: Three figure drawings mounted to a sheet of paper: a. loosely drawn figure with several layers of clothing; wears a scarf on head and holds a rope with a skull on the end in PL hand b. loosely rendered image of a female figure wearing a long, flowing garment; arms raised toward PL, holding an object in both hands c. loosely drawn figure viewed from the torso up to head; wear an ornate headpiece or crown with two prongs and a diamond shape in the center
provenance: [Arsène Bonafous-Murat, Paris, until about 1994; sold to Mix]; Elizabeth Mix, Indianapolis (given to Weisbergs); Yvonne and Gabriel Weisberg, Minneapolis (until 2018; given to Mia)
title: Untitled (Costume study)
